name: Frag Grenade
desc: Explodes after a short delay.

name: Sticky Grenade
desc: A grenade that sticks to surfaces before detonating.

name: Trip Mine
desc: Magnetic mine that launches into the air and detonates when an enemy interrupts the beam.

name: Cluster Grenade
desc: A Sticky grenade that explodes in a series of smaller explosions.

name: Combat Axe
desc: Retrievable axe that kills instantly on impact.

name: Thermite
desc: Sticks to any surface of an object. Burns enemies violently for a short period upon impact.

name: Molotov Cocktail
desc: Explodes on impact, setting the affected area on fire.

name: Contact Grenade
desc: A grenade that explodes immediately upon contact with any surface.

name: C4
desc: Explosive that sticks to surfaces and can be detonated remotely.

name: Smoke Grenade
desc: Grenade that creates a smokescreen when detonated.

name: Flashbang Grenade
desc: Device that blinds and deafens the target when detonated.

name: Concussion Grenade
desc: Disorients and slows enemy movement speed.

name: EMP
desc: Damages and disables nearby mechanized enemy units and equipment.

name: Trophy System
desc: A deployable autonomous defense system that destroys incoming explosives.

name: Cryo Bomb
desc: Releases a surge of freezing air that slows the enemy.

name: Heartbeat Sensor
desc: A tablet that displays rough information about nearby enemies.

name: Gas Grenade
desc: Detonates after collision and releases continuous tear gas, causing deceleration, blurred vision and coughing.

name: Storm Ball
desc: A spherical barrier is generated at a designated location to block the enemy's line of sight. Enemies inside the barrier will not recover health.

name: Flash Drone
desc: Releases a flash drone that blocks enemies' vision.

name: Echo Grenade
desc: A grenade that uses soud waves to detect enemy locations.

name: Stim Shot
desc: Increases health regen and movement speed for a short duration.

name: Decoy Grenade
desc: It simulates fake gunfire and radar signatures to confuse enemies.

name: Trip Sensor
desc: Sticky explosive that attaches to surfaces and detonates upon enemy proximity, slows the enemies down and reveals enemy positions on the mini-map.

name: Douser Grenade
desc: Nulifies the negative effects brought by Molotov Cocktail, Gas Grenade, Thermite, etc.

name: Flash Strike
desc: A special tactical that can cause flashes by drilling through cover. The tip is fragile and easily destroyed.
